alert.note: Alert for Creek; Osage; Pawnee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 9:22PM CST until January 02 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST SUNDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 to 10 degrees below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, light snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Osage, Pawnee and Creek Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 10 AM CST Sunday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 3 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Exposed skin may become quickly frostbitten or frozen. Any light snow could cause slippery road conditions especially bridges and overpasses.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling overnight. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. For the latest road conditions call 1-844-465-4997 or go to okRoads.org.
